item.title: Test content for blog
item.description: Note: This article is the second in a six-part series about getting started with Albacross. There are links to all of the articles at the bottom of the page. Account-based marketing has become a lot more sophisticated in the last few years. New technology has enabled marketers to target leads in new ways. At Albacross, weâ€™re incredibly proud of our ad platform, which gives you the power to directly target your leads with personalised ads.
